title: Firefox adds national suffix to the website
content:
Hi,

I live in Switzerland. When I type website address: https://www.pokemon.com Firefox changes it constantly (and instantly) to: https://www.pokemon.com/de/ which is useless to me because I don't know German.

Could you help me with that?
creator: malecek1

title: Firefox won't open
content: Every time i open Firefox a little window comes up and says for a fraction of a second that im using an older version of Firefox (Even though that i'm using the latest) and then it crashes. I've tried everything, from reinstalling, rebooting, making exceptions in the firewall and even manually installing Firefox, but nothing. Before anyone asks, i do not have AVG, Avast or Commodo, and the Firewall is the basic Windows one. The issue is very similar to this one:https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/970099. I also tried what they said, but unfortunately nothing woks for me.
creator: Legend_

title: Travamento ao usar dois monitores
content:
Quando utilizo o laptop isoladamente o navegador carrega e posso usá-lo sem dificuldade. Ao inserir uma tela adicional através da porta HDMI, é verificada a instabilidade instantânea culminando no travamento. O mesmo não ocorre com outros navegadores. Resumindo, sem o segundo monitor funciona, com, trava e não é mais possível usar.

Alguém que tenha experimentado algo parecido e possa indicar como resolveu o problema?

O equipamento em questão traz consigo Windows 11 com todos os drivers e navegador atualizados; agora, por exemplo, ao colocar esta questão, o faço através do Mozilla.
creator: willerlimonge

title: About Passwords
content: I notice that Firefox browser do not need password protection to access the saved password. So, if the unauthorized person can access my PC and open the Firefox browser and access the Passwords, that person can access easily. I would like to know will there be update feature or function in future version? Thank You and I look forward and hearing from you.
creator: thanttyoo

title: streaming titoli prime video non funziona
content: Ho un notebook con Windows 7 SP1 32bit e Firefox V102.0.1 32 bit. I codec H264 e Widevine sono installati e attivi; spunta riproduci DRM attiva... Tuttavia, la riproduzione dei titoli prime video non funziona. Assistenza prime video non ha risolto.....

title: Facebook dialogue box editing CTRL C Failure
content:
I wrote an article on FB and wanted to save a copy before publishing...

I select using Control A in the dialogue box

I paste using Control V

It only selects and copies the first sentence...

Tried the same thing with CTRL A, CTRL X same result

Windows clipboard doesn't pick it up...

Right click and copy is the same...

What works is Marking the text with the mouse and dragging down the page..

Ideas?

previously it was fine, used it all the time with Ditto as well

Current latest FF and Win 11 all updated
creator: gerry.tye

title: firefox facebook container
content: In the last few days I have been unable to upload photo files to my website. I have allowed the site in facebook container. I cannot log out from my website after using Firefox to login. If I use Chrome I have no problem with either of the above but when checking with Firefox I am still logged into my website. I cannot access Facebook when using Firefox but have no problem with Chrome. I put these problems down to the Facebook container. Something has obviously changed lately and is causing problems. This is become most annoying, can Firefox staff please help. Best regards Erica Siegel www.ericasiegel-photography.com
creator: ericasiegel

title: What's best for web development ESR or developer edition?
content: I am on ESR 78.15 Oesr (64 bit) should I stay on it or move to another version of Firefox if I am a web developer? From what I can gather they are the same? I am on debian linux kde

title: ESR version of firefox does not allow multi containers add-on
content: I went to the official add-on site and I did not see the Add-on named "multi containers" made by Firefox themselves, yet there were about 6 pages of add-on's similar named 'container' but not the one I wanted which is called 'multi containers' add-on.

title: Lost Favorite Bookmarks from the Toolbar
content:
Hi Firefox Community support,

I am not sure what happened but I updated my firefox browser tonight and all my favorite bookmark toolbar disappeared. Is there any easier way to bring them back to show in the browser page's top as before. They are sitting in the folders but now showing up anymore. Tried dragging them but them won't budge. Closed out browser, restarted macbook - nothing worked. It's already wasted so much time in researching and troubleshooting without a fully applicable instruction anywhere for a mac user trying to resolve this issue.

Also, tried to upload image in word or pdf, but it doesn't work with the format here perhaps. Not sure what else can I easily and quickly try.

Please help, thx!
creator: bjazzmk
